original_title: P.D.Q. Bach: The Abduction of Figaro
overview: Chorus, Corpse de Ballet, Orchestra of the Minnisota Opera, the Whole Schmeer, under the direction of Professor Peter Schickele  Based on several of Mozart's most famous Operas including The Marriage of Figaro, Don Giovanni, Cosi Fan Tutti and making fun of everything from Star Wars to the Maltese Falcon this is an Opera only PDQ Bach could have written.
tagline: A Simply Grand Opera in Three Acts.
title: P.D.Q. Bach: The Abduction of Figaro
